title: Hello World
description: The classical introductory exercise. Just say "Hello, World!"

title: Gopher's Gorgeous Lasagna
description: Learn about packages, functions, and variables by helping Gopher cook lasagna.

title: Annalyn's Infiltration
description: Learn about booleans by helping Annalyn free her best friend.

title: Party Robot
description: Learn about strings by programming a party robot.

title: Weather Forecast
description: Learn about comments by helping a weather station manage their weather forecasting program.

title: Blackjack
description: Learn about conditionals by playing Blackjack.

title: Booking up for Beauty
description: Learn about time by handling appointments in a beauty salon.

title: Cars Assemble
description: Learn about numbers and type conversion by analyzing an assembly line in a car factory.

title: Vehicle Purchase
description: Learn about comparison and conditional-ifs while preparing for your next vehicle purchase

title: Gross Store
description: Learn about maps by selling items by the dozen at the Gross Store.

title: Lasagna Master
description: Dive deeper into Go functions while preparing to cook the perfect lasagna.

title: Need For Speed
description: Learn about structs by racing remote controlled cars.

title: Elon's Toys
description: Learn about methods by playing with Elon's toys

title: Bird Watcher
description: Count the birds in your garden with for loops.

title: Card Tricks
description: Learn about slices by doing card tricks.

title: Logs, Logs, Logs!
description: Learn about the strings package by parsing logs.

title: Sorting Room
description: Learn about type casting and type assertions in the sorting room.

title: Chessboard
description: Learn about iterating ranges by generating a chessboard.

title: The Farm
description: Learn about errors and interfaces while feeding cows on the farm.

title: Census
description: Learn about zero values.

title: Welcome To Tech Palace!
description: Learn about strings and the strings package by generating text for a store's new display.

title: Election Day
description: Learn about pointers by creating a simple voting system.

title: Interest is Interesting
description: Learn about floating point numbers by adding interest to savings accounts.

title: Two Fer
description: Create a sentence of the form "One for X, one for me."

title: Hamming
description: Calculate the Hamming difference between two DNA strands.

title: Raindrops
description: Convert a number to a string, the content of which depends on the number's factors.

title: Scrabble Score
description: Given a word, compute the Scrabble score for that word.

title: Isogram
description: Determine if a word or phrase is an isogram.

title: Difference Of Squares
description: Find the difference between the square of the sum and the sum of the squares of the first N natural numbers.

title: Luhn
description: Given a number determine whether or not it is valid per the Luhn formula.

title: Grains
description: Calculate the number of grains of wheat on a chessboard given that the number on each square doubles.

title: Clock
description: Implement a clock that handles times without dates.

title: Parallel Letter Frequency
description: Count the frequency of letters in texts using parallel computation.

title: Tree Building
description: Implement a tree building algorithm.

title: Robot Name
description: Manage robot factory settings.

title: Tournament
description: Tally the results of a small football competition.

title: Twelve Days
description: Output the lyrics to 'The Twelve Days of Christmas'

title: Matrix
description: Given a string representing a matrix of numbers, return the rows and columns of that matrix.

title: Error Handling
description: Implement various kinds of error handling and resource management

title: Bank Account
description: Simulate a bank account supporting opening/closing, withdraws, and deposits of money. Watch out for concurrent transactions!

title: Space Age
description: Given an age in seconds, calculate how old someone is in terms of a given planet's solar years.

title: Leap
description: Given a year, report if it is a leap year.

title: Triangle
description: Determine if a triangle is equilateral, isosceles, or scalene.

title: Proverb
description: For want of a horseshoe nail, a kingdom was lost, or so the saying goes. Output the full text of this proverbial rhyme.

title: Nucleotide Count
description: Given a DNA string, compute how many times each nucleotide occurs in the string.

title: Rna Transcription
description: Given a DNA strand, return its RNA Complement Transcription.

title: Roman Numerals
description: Write a function to convert from normal numbers to Roman Numerals.

title: Strain
description: Implement the `keep` and `discard` operation on collections. Given a collection and a predicate on the collection's elements, `keep` returns a new collection containing those elements where the predicate is true, while `discard` returns a new collection containing those elements where the predicate is false.

title: Etl
description: We are going to do the `Transform` step of an Extract-Transform-Load.

title: Protein Translation
description: Translate RNA sequences into proteins.

title: Pangram
description: Determine if a sentence is a pangram.

title: Reverse String
description: Reverse a string

title: Anagram
description: Given a word and a list of possible anagrams, select the correct sublist.

title: Word Count
description: Given a phrase, count the occurrences of each word in that phrase.

title: Run Length Encoding
description: Implement run-length encoding and decoding.

title: Isbn Verifier
description: Check if a given string is a valid ISBN-10 number.

title: Largest Series Product
description: Given a string of digits, calculate the largest product for a contiguous substring of digits of length n.

title: Nth Prime
description: Given a number n, determine what the nth prime is.

title: Pythagorean Triplet
description: There exists exactly one Pythagorean triplet for which a + b + c = 1000. Find the product a * b * c.

title: Sum Of Multiples
description: Given a number, find the sum of all the multiples of particular numbers up to but not including that number.

title: Rotational Cipher
description: Create an implementation of the rotational cipher, also sometimes called the Caesar cipher.

title: Atbash Cipher
description: Create an implementation of the atbash cipher, an ancient encryption system created in the Middle East.

title: Crypto Square
description: Implement the classic method for composing secret messages called a square code.

title: Simple Cipher
description: Implement a simple shift cipher like Caesar and a more secure substitution cipher

title: Diffie Hellman
description: Diffie-Hellman key exchange.

title: All Your Base
description: Convert a number, represented as a sequence of digits in one base, to any other base.

title: Sieve
description: Use the Sieve of Eratosthenes to find all the primes from 2 up to a given number.

title: Allergies
description: Given a person's allergy score, determine whether or not they're allergic to a given item, and their full list of allergies.

title: Perfect Numbers
description: Determine if a number is perfect, abundant, or deficient based on Nicomachus' (60 - 120 CE) classification scheme for positive integers.

title: Secret Handshake
description: Given a decimal number, convert it to the appropriate sequence of events for a secret handshake.

title: Variable Length Quantity
description: Implement variable length quantity encoding and decoding.

title: Armstrong Numbers
description: Determine if a number is an Armstrong number

title: Meetup
description: Calculate the date of meetups.

title: Phone Number
description: Clean up user-entered phone numbers so that they can be sent SMS messages.

title: Prime Factors
description: Compute the prime factors of a given natural number.

title: Pig Latin
description: Implement a program that translates from English to Pig Latin

title: Series
description: Given a string of digits, output all the contiguous substrings of length `n` in that string.

title: Ledger
description: Refactor a ledger printer.

title: Linked List
description: Implement a doubly linked list

title: Rail Fence Cipher
description: Implement encoding and decoding for the rail fence cipher.

title: Binary Search
description: Implement a binary search algorithm.

title: Binary Search Tree
description: Insert and search for numbers in a binary tree.

title: Two Bucket
description: Given two buckets of different size, demonstrate how to measure an exact number of liters.

title: Matching Brackets
description: Make sure the brackets and braces all match.

title: Pov
description: Reparent a graph on a selected node

title: Wordy
description: Parse and evaluate simple math word problems returning the answer as an integer.

title: Palindrome Products
description: Detect palindrome products in a given range.

title: Say
description: Given a number from 0 to 999,999,999,999, spell out that number in English.

title: Kindergarten Garden
description: Given a diagram, determine which plants each child in the kindergarten class is responsible for.

title: Diamond
description: Given a letter, print a diamond starting with 'A' with the supplied letter at the widest point.

title: Grep
description: Search a file for lines matching a regular expression pattern. Return the line number and contents of each matching line.

title: Pascals Triangle
description: Compute Pascal's triangle up to a given number of rows.

title: Rectangles
description: Count the rectangles in an ASCII diagram.

title: Yacht
description: Score a single throw of dice in the game Yacht

title: Bowling
description: Score a bowling game

title: Poker
description: Pick the best hand(s) from a list of poker hands.

title: Ocr Numbers
description: Given a 3 x 4 grid of pipes, underscores, and spaces, determine which number is represented, or whether it is garbled.

title: Beer Song
description: Produce the lyrics to that beloved classic, that field-trip favorite: 99 Bottles of Beer on the Wall.

title: Food Chain
description: Generate the lyrics of the song 'I Know an Old Lady Who Swallowed a Fly'

title: House
description: Output the nursery rhyme 'This is the House that Jack Built'.

title: Markdown
description: Refactor a Markdown parser

title: Sublist
description: Write a function to determine if a list is a sublist of another list.

title: Spiral Matrix
description: Given the size, return a square matrix of numbers in spiral order.

title: Word Search
description: Create a program to solve a word search puzzle.

title: Minesweeper
description: Add the numbers to a minesweeper board

title: Queen Attack
description: Given the position of two queens on a chess board, indicate whether or not they are positioned so that they can attack each other.

title: Saddle Points
description: Detect saddle points in a matrix.

title: Transpose
description: Take input text and output it transposed.

title: Connect
description: Compute the result for a game of Hex / Polygon

title: Flatten Array
description: Take a nested list and return a single list with all values except nil/null

title: Custom Set
description: Create a custom set type.

title: Dominoes
description: Make a chain of dominoes.

title: Simple Linked List
description: Write a simple linked list implementation that uses Elements and a List

title: Alphametics
description: Write a function to solve alphametics puzzles.

title: Circular Buffer
description: A data structure that uses a single, fixed-size buffer as if it were connected end-to-end.

title: Book Store
description: To try and encourage more sales of different books from a popular 5 book series, a bookshop has decided to offer discounts of multiple-book purchases.

title: Change
description: Correctly determine change to be given using the least number of coins

title: Grade School
description: Given students' names along with the grade that they are in, create a roster for the school

title: Paasio
description: Report network IO statistics

title: Robot Simulator
description: Write a robot simulator.

title: Zebra Puzzle
description: Solve the zebra puzzle.

title: Forth
description: Implement an evaluator for a very simple subset of Forth

title: React
description: Implement a basic reactive system.

title: Collatz Conjecture
description: Calculate the number of steps to reach 1 using the Collatz conjecture

title: Gigasecond
description: Given a moment, determine the moment that would be after a gigasecond has passed.

title: Bob
description: Bob is a lackadaisical teenager. In conversation, his responses are very limited.

title: Darts
description: Write a function that returns the earned points in a single toss of a Darts game

title: Acronym
description: Convert a long phrase to its acronym

title: List Ops
description: Implement basic list operations

title: Scale Generator
description: Generate musical scales, given a starting note and a set of intervals.
